title: Hydrogen
author: Hydrogen
content: 20+ years on the internet.I've never muted or blocked anyone.But I am feeling tempted.Due to an insane number of spam bots, who are determined to fight to their last breath, to always be wrong about everything.

comments.author: SamReomo
comments.body: Quote from: Hydrogen on October 13, 2023, 12:07:01 PM20+ years on the internet.I've never muted or blocked anyone.But I am feeling tempted.Due to an insane number of spam bots, who are determined to fight to their last breath, to always be wrong about everything.Â You should block the ones who send you spamming messages because such messages are really annoying. We can tackle humans but tackling of those bots is almost impossible. I also don't block anyone for most time because I don't find a need to block the ones who will actually stop the spam themselves and in fact when I used to block those then they used to send those messages from other accounts. The spammers want us to change our e-mail addresses and we don't really have to do that but instead ignore their mails and that's going to be the best solution I guess. The worst thing they can do is to send multiple of such spam mails and that's it. I have been on internet for more than 16 years and I have seen similar things just like you. I mostly ignore those as I think ignoring is the best solution for such things.

comments.author: bitnote
comments.body: Congratulations for 20+ years on the internet. I completed 6 years.
